title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 2 HANGED MAN
description:
1. You have a conversation with the hanged man dressed in your disco outfit.
2. You find out that you have failed Elysium.
THE CORRECT VERSION

dialogueTree.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Do you remember the scent of your c..."
dialogueTree.english: Do you remember the scent of your childhood?

links.title: You: "What *is* this?"
links.english: What *is* this?
links.polish: *Kto to*?
links.belarusian: *Хто гэта*?

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "What it says on the can, Harry. Ans..."
links.english: What it says on the can, Harry. Answer the question.
links.polish: Masz napisane, Harry. Odpowiedz na pytanie.
links.belarusian: У цябе напісана, Гары. Адкажы на пытанне.

links.title: You: "I remember nothing."
links.english: I remember nothing.
links.polish: Nie pamiętam niczego.
links.belarusian: Я нічога не памятаю.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Do you remember your wife's hand on..."
links.english: Do you remember your wife's hand on your face?
links.polish: Pamiętasz rękę twojej żony na swojej twarzy?
links.belarusian: Ты памятаеш руку сваёй жонкі на сваім твары?

links.title: You: "TELL ME WHAT THIS IS!!! I'm not ans..."
links.english: TELL ME WHAT THIS IS!!! I'm not answering before you tell me who you are.
links.polish: CO DO MNIE GADA? Nie odpowiem ci, dopóki mi nie powiesz, kim jesteś.
links.belarusian: ДО МЯНЕ ГАВОРЫЦЬ? Я табе не адкажу, пакуль ты мне не скажаш, кім ты з"яўляешся.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You know who I am. I am the bad day..."
links.english: You know who I am. I am the bad day. The one where you ask her, and then later in the streets, wandering... It's the worst day of all time, Harry dear, and it's coming. She will hear about it on the phone.
links.polish: Wiesz, kim jestem. Jestem złym dniem. Tym, w którym ją pytasz, a potem chodzisz bez celu po ulicy... Tym najgorszym dniem wszech czasów, drogi Harry, i nadciągam. A ona dowie się wszystkiego przez telefon.
links.belarusian: Ты ведаеш, хто я. Я дрэнны дзень. Той, у які ты пытаешся ў яе, а потым бадзяешся без мэты па вуліцы... Той найгоршы дзень усіх часоў, дарагі Гары, і я набліжаюся. А яна даведаецца ўсё праз тэлефон.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Reality will turn into a grotesque..."
links.english: Reality will turn into a grotesque nightmare. This'll be the last thing you did to her. Tell me -- do you remember the love of your life?
links.polish: Prawda zmieni się w groteskowy koszmar. To będzie ostatnia rzecz, jaką jej zrobiłeś. Powiedz: czy pamiętasz miłość swojego życia?
links.belarusian: Праўда ператворыцца ў гротэскны кашмар. Гэта будзе апошняя рэч, якую ты ёй зрабіў. Скажы: ці памятаеш ты каханне свайго жыцця?

links.title: You: "You said... who?"
links.english: You said... who?
links.polish: Znaczy że... kogo?
links.belarusian: Значыць што... каго?

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Do you remember the warmth of her t..."
links.english: Do you remember the warmth of her thighs, between her legs and in her mouth?
links.polish: Pamiętasz ciepło jej ud? Jej wnętrza? Jej ust?
links.belarusian: Памятаеш цяпло яе сцягна? Яе ўнутры? Яе вуснаў?

links.title: You: "I left."
links.english: I left.
links.polish: To ja odszedłem.
links.belarusian: Гэта я сышоў.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Oh no, funky-baby, you *stayed*. It..."
links.english: Oh no, funky-baby, you *stayed*. It was the rest of it that left. While you just stood there. With one hand on the bottle and the other on your dick -- watching it go.
links.polish: O nie, chłopaczynko, *zostałeś*. To cała reszta odeszła, a ty tylko tam stałeś. Butelka w jednej ręce, twój kutas w drugiej. I patrzyłeś, jak odchodzi.
links.belarusian: О не, хлопча, *застаўся*. Усе астатнія пайшлі, а ты толькі стаяў. Бутэлька ў адной руцэ, твайго кура ў другой. І глядзеў, як яна сыходзіць.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Tell me, where are your friends? Hu..."
links.english: Tell me, where are your friends? Human beings have friends, Harry-boy. Where the hell are yours?
links.polish: Powiedz mi, gdzie twoi przyjaciele? Istoty ludzkie mają przyjaciół, Harry, chłopaczku. Gdzie, do cholery, są twoi?
links.belarusian: Скажы мне, дзе твае сябры? Людзі маюць сяброў, Гары, хлопчык. Дзе, чорт вазьмі, яны?

links.title: You: "I can get it all back."
links.english: I can get it all back.
links.polish: Mogę to wszystko odzyskać.
links.belarusian: Я магу ўсё гэта вярнуць.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "No. It's gone. Three times gone and..."
links.english: No. It's gone. Three times gone and never coming back. You failed. You failed me.
links.polish: Nie. To zniknęło. Po trzykroć. I nigdy nie wróci. Zawiodłeś. Zawiodłeś mnie.
links.belarusian: Не. Гэта знікла. Тройчы. І ніколі не вернецца. Ты падвёў. Ты падвёў мяне.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You failed Elysium."
links.english: You failed Elysium.
links.polish: Zawiodłeś Elizjum.
links.belarusian: Ты падвёў Элізіум.

links.title: You: "What is Elysium?"
links.english: What is Elysium?
links.polish: Czym jest Elizjum?
links.belarusian: Што такое Элізій?

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Everything. The pale and the isolas..."
links.english: Everything. The pale and the isolas -- on the surface -- the outer magnetosphere... Burning, furious truth, eight thousand years of written history.
links.polish: Wszystkim. Szarotą i isolami – na powierzchni – zewnętrzną magnetosferą... Płonącą, wściekłą prawdą, ośmioma tysiącami lat zapisanej historii.
links.belarusian: Усім. Шаротай і ізолямі – на паверхні – знешняй магнітасферай... Палаючай, лютай праўдай, васьмю тысячамі гадоў запісанай гісторыі.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You really dropped the ball, Harry...."
links.english: You really dropped the ball, Harry. Four point six billion people -- and you failed every single one of them. You really *fucked up*.
links.polish: Naprawdę to spieprzyłeś, Harry. Cztery miliardy sześćset milionów ludzi, a ty zawiodłeś ich co do jednego. *Spierdoliłeś sprawę*.
links.belarusian: Сапраўды, ты ўсё зруйнаваў, Гары. Чатыры мільярды шэсцьсот мільёнаў людзей, а ты не апраўдаў іхніх спадзяванняў ні аднаго. *Ты сапсаваў справу*.

links.title: You: "I've seen you before..."
links.english: I've seen you before...
links.polish: Widziałem cię już wcześniej...
links.belarusian: Я бачыў цябе ўжо раней...

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "No, Harry. You were just talking to..."
links.english: No, Harry. You were just talking to yourself. That's all you ever do. Even in your dreams. And the act is wearing thin, the spots of the disco ball fade around you...
links.polish: Nie, Harry. Po prostu mówiłeś do siebie. To jedyne, co w ogóle robisz. Nawet w swoich snach. I pozory zaczynają zanikać, światełka dyskotekowej kuli przygasają...
links.belarusian: Не, Гары. Ты проста размаўляў з самім сабой. Гэта адзінае, што ты ўвогуле робіш. Нават у сваіх снах. І зман пачынае знікаць, агеньчыкі дыскатэчнай шары змяншаюцца...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "You'll be back in those cold snake..."
links.english: You'll be back in those cold snake skins in no time, sweating up the bed...
links.polish: Wrócisz do tych zimnych wężowych skór, ani się obejrzysz. Będziesz leżał zapocony w łóżku...
links.belarusian: Вярнешся да гэтых халодных змеіных скур, і не паспееўшы азірнуцца. Будзеш ляжаць у пасцелі ўпоце ўвесь...

links.title: Limbic System: "Stinky boy."
links.english: Stinky boy.
links.polish: Śmierdzielu.
links.belarusian: Смярдзюк.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "No, you haven't. You're just sleep-..."
links.english: No, you haven't. You're just sleep-talking. And the act is wearing thin too, the spots on the disco ball fade around you...
links.polish: Nie, nie widziałeś. Gadasz tylko przez sen. I pozory zaczynają gasnąć, światełka dyskotekowej kuli przygasają...
links.belarusian: Не, ты не бачыў. Ты толькі размаўляеш праз сон. І прывід пачынае згасаць, агеньчыкі дыскатэчнай шары знікаюць...

links.title: You: "I can come back from this."
links.english: I can come back from this.
links.polish: Mogę się z tego wygrzebać.
links.belarusian: Я магу з гэтага выбрацца.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You're not coming back from shit! T..."
links.english: You're not coming back from shit! Thrashing around in that *high-conductivity state* of yours, bumping into things and acting like a *clown*. Who are you kidding?
links.polish: Gówno, a nie się wygrzebiesz! Miotasz się w tym stanie *wysokiego przewodzenia*, wpadasz na wszystko wokół i zachowujesz się jak *błazen*. Kogo ty oszukujesz?
links.belarusian: Гаўно, а не выкараскаешся! Мятуешся ў гэтым стане *высокай праводнасці*, натыкаешся на ўсё навокал і паводзіш сябе як *клоун*. Кога ты падманваеш?

links.title: You: "I'm trying to solve... trying to so..."
links.english: I'm trying to solve... trying to solve this case.
links.polish: Próbuję rozwiązać... rozwiązać tę sprawę.
links.belarusian: Я спрабую вырашыць... вырашыць гэтую справу.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "You're trying to what? I can't hear..."
links.english: You're trying to what? I can't hear you, this is just a word-dream now. Jumbled up garbage. The pictures are gone, the bed rises to meet you. A thin sleep-like state. More glass than velvet, *grinding* in your head.
links.polish: Co próbujesz? Nie słyszę cię, tu jest teraz tylko sen słów. Poplątany śmietnik. Obrazy zniknęły, łóżko spotyka się z tobą u dołu. Niejasny, przypominający sen stan. Bardziej szklany niż aksamitny *trze* o twój mózg.
links.belarusian: Што ты спрабуеш? Я не чую цябе, тут зараз толькі сон слоў. Блытаны сметнік. Выявы зніклі, ложак сустракаецца з табой унізе. Няясны, падобны да сну стан. Больш шкляны, чым аксамітны, *трэ* па тваім мазгу.

links.title: Limbic System: "So-something is *wrong*. Sleep shou..."
links.english: So-something is *wrong*. Sleep shouldn't be this bad. This dry. This un-nourishing. There's something wrong with your thoughts. Some kind of... new type of hangover...
links.polish: C-coś jest *nie tak*. Sen nie powinien być taki zły. Taki suchy. Taki nieregenerujący. Coś jest nie tak z twoimi myślami. To jakiś... nowy rodzaj kaca...
links.belarusian: Нешта не так. Сон не павінен быць такі дрэнны. Такі сухі. Такі неаднаўляльны. Нешта не так з тваімі думкамі. Гэта нейкі... новы від пахмелля...

links.title: You: "God... there's *another* type?"
links.english: God... there's *another* type?
links.polish: Boże... Jest jakiś *inny* rodzaj?
links.belarusian: Божа... Ёсць які-небудзь *іншы* выгляд?

links.title: Limbic System: "Oh yes, party boy. And it's *worse*..."
links.english: Oh yes, party boy. And it's *worse* than the one before! Just think of the shit you saw! Here it comes too, so soon already! A silent alarm goes off in your head, like clockwork, barely let you sleep at all... Time to get those clothes on, Harry!
links.polish: O tak, imprezowy chłopaczku. I jest jeszcze *gorszy* niż ten poprzedni! Pomyśl tylko o tym, jaki syf widziałeś! Nadchodzi, jest już tak niedaleko! W twojej głowie rozlega się cichy alarm, jak w zegarku, ledwo daje ci spać... Czas zakładać ubranie, Harry!
links.belarusian: О так, імпрэза-хлопчык. І ён яшчэ *горшы*, чым папярэдні! Толькі падумай, які бруд ты бачыў! Ён набліжаецца, ужо так недалёка! У тваёй галаве гучыць ціхае папярэджанне, як у гадзінніку, ледзь дае табе спаць... Пара апранаць адзенне, Гары!

links.title: Limbic System: "Time to go to work in the shit fact..."
links.english: Time to go to work in the shit factory!
links.polish: Czas wstawać do roboty w fabryce gówna!
links.belarusian: Час уставаць на працу ў фабрыку гаўна!

links.title: Limbic System: "..."
You: "What? No!"
links.english: What? No!
links.polish: Co? Nie!
links.belarusian: Што? Не!

links.title: You: "My mind is tired and broken."
links.english: My mind is tired and broken.
links.polish: Mój umysł jest zmęczony i zniszczony.
links.belarusian: Мой розум стомлены і знясілены.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Your mind is what now? I can't hear..."
links.english: Your mind is what now? I can't hear you, the rest is just a word-dream. Jumbled up garbage. The pictures are gone, the bed rises to meet you. A thin, sleep-like state. More glass than velvet, *grinding* in your head.
links.polish: Co z tym twoim umysłem? Nie słyszę cię, otacza mnie tylko sen słów. Poplątany śmietnik. Obrazy zniknęły, łóżko spotyka się z tobą u dołu. Niejasny, przypominający sen stan. Bardziej szklany niż aksamitny *trze* o twój mózg.
links.belarusian: Што з тваім розумам? Я цябе не чую, мяне атачае толькі сон слоў. Заблытаны смеццевы кантэйнер. Вобразы зніклі, ложак сустракаецца з табой унізе. Недакладны, падобны да сну стан. Больш шкляны, чым аксамітны, церэ твой мозг.

links.title: You: "Help me..."
links.english: Help me...
links.polish: Pomóż mi...
links.belarusian: Дапамажы мне...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Help you, why? I can't hear you, th..."
links.english: Help you, why? I can't hear you, the rest is just a word-dream. Jumbled up garbage. The pictures are gone, the bed rises to meet you. A thin, sleep-like state. More glass than velvet, *grinding* in your head.
links.polish: Pomóc ci? Czemu? Nie słyszę cię, otacza mnie tylko sen słów. Poplątany śmietnik. Obrazy zniknęły, łóżko spotyka się z tobą u dołu. Niejasny, przypominający sen stan. Bardziej szklany niż aksamitny *trze* o twój mózg.
links.belarusian: Дапамагчы табе? Чаму? Я цябе не чую, мяне акружае толькі сон слоў. Заблытанае смецце. Образы зніклі, ложак сустракаецца з табой унізе. Няясны, падобны на сон стан. Больш шкляны, чым аксамітны, *трэ* аб твой мозг.

links.title: You: "I don't want to come back."
links.english: I don't want to come back.
links.polish: Nie chcę do tego wracać.
links.belarusian: Я не хачу да гэтага вяртацца.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "They were only cramping your *desce..."
links.english: They were only cramping your *descent into the abyss*. Now they're gone. Three times gone and never coming back -- all of it. You failed. You failed me.
links.polish: Utrudniali ci tylko *zstąpienie w pustkę*. A teraz zniknęli. Wszystko zniknęło. Po trzykroć. I nigdy nie wróci. Zawiodłeś. Zawiodłeś mnie.
links.belarusian: Яны толькі ўскладнялі табе *спуск у пустэчу*. А цяпер яны зніклі. Усё знікла. Тройчы. І ніколі не вернецца. Ты падвёў. Ты падвёў мяне.

links.title: You: "I was left."
links.english: I was left.
links.polish: Zostałem porzucony.
links.belarusian: Мяне кінулі.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "That's right, funky-baby, and you j..."
links.english: That's right, funky-baby, and you just stood there. One hand on the bottle and the other on your dick -- watching her go. Let it all be dragged away from you.
links.polish: Właśnie tak, chłopaczynko, a ty tylko tam stałeś. Butelka w jednej ręce, twój kutas w drugiej. I patrzyłeś, jak odchodzi. Jak tracisz wszystko za jednym zamachem.
links.belarusian: Менавіта так, хлопча, а ты толькі там стаяў. Бутэлька ў адной руцэ, твой член у другой. І глядзеў, як яна сыходзіць. Як губляеш усё за адзін раз.

links.title: You: "I was born in a hospital where peop..."
links.english: I was born in a hospital where people usually go to die.
links.polish: Urodziłem się w szpitalu, w którym ludzie zazwyczaj umierają.
links.belarusian: Я нарадзіўся ў бальніцы, у якой людзі звычайна паміраюць.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You're not kidding anyone, Harry. Y..."
links.english: You're not kidding anyone, Harry. You don't remember shit. Tell me...
links.polish: Nikogo nie oszukasz, Harry. Gówno pamiętasz. Powiedz...
links.belarusian: Нікога не ашукаеш, Гары. Ты нічога не памятаеш. Скажы...
